input_args.passage: 'Old-earth or young-earth belief | CMI takes the stand that the creation is thousands of years old, based on straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
input_args.claim: 'Secondly, source summarizes the Young-Earth Creationist view, which believes that the creation days of Genesis 1 were six literal (24-hour) days, which occurred 6,000–12,000 years ago.'
